name: twine-enhancer
description: Unofficial enhancements and tuning for Twine (online version)

scripts.clean: rm -rf build && mkdirp build && mkdirp build/content && mkirp build/background
scripts.copydest: cp -r ./manifest.json ./syncOptions.js ./options ./_locales ./icons build && cp -r content/content.bundle.js content/*.css build/content && cp -r background/index.bundle.js build/background
scripts.postbuild: npm run copydest && npm run pack
